Nerangs.ab: nerang-e hum čidan be dastur-e barsom čidan vāǧ gereftan va be-hamān dastur čidan va se gereh-e hum aval ke be ašem vohi činad dar miyān-e angošt negāh dārid va har čand ke ḫᵛāhad čidan va fe humdān kardan va be-hamān šāḫ be-dastur-e barsom čidan va vāǧ be-goftan ān se gereh-e hum rā ham be-humdān kardan va sar-e humdān moḥkam kardan va dast az humdān ǧodā kardan va vāǧ tamām be goftan

"Instruction for cutting the hum in the way as the cutting the barsom. He should take the vāǧ and cut it in the same way (like the barsom). First, he cuts three pieces of hum (each one) while reciting one Ašem Vohū. You inspect them between your fingers. For as many as you want to cut and put in the humdān he should say the vāǧ in the way as it is done for the cutting of the barsom. He should put these three pieces of hum in the humdān, place the humdān, remove the hand from the humdān and complete the vāǧ."
